issue.title: Pricing : when a product has fee without profile is updated via EXTRACT interface, the pricing branch is not correctly updated
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Pricing :
When an order containing at least a product with 'fee without profile' is updated via EXTRACT interface, the pricing branch is not correctly updated:
* The pricing branch should be updated only when all product have a price (do not 'increment' totals)
* The totals should include the fees at all level (provider and order)
* The saved configuration at the time of the order (fees and pricing policies) should be applied

Plus:
* The update method should be place in the component helper to be user by the _manual process_ (_request_ controller)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
